autofocussystem: Single (Continuous in Auto and Easy modes), Servo AF, Servo AE, Manual Focus
focusingrange: Auto: 0.4 in. (1 cm) – infinity (W), 3.3 ft. (1 cm) – infinity (T) Normal: 2.0 in. (5 cm) – infinity (W), 3.3 ft. (1 m) – infinity (T) Macro: 0.4 in. 1.6 ft. (1-50 cm) (W)
storagemedia: SD Memory Card, SDHC Memory Card, SDXC Memory Card, Eye-Fi
lcdmonitor: 3.0-inch TFT color LCD with wide viewing angle
fileformat: Design rule for Camera File System, DPOF (Version 1.1) compliant
